MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Peckforton, Spurstow and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to third party damage to an underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible in stages by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.10PM on 28th October 2020.
